TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit BuildEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public MustInherit Class BuildEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class BuildEventArgs abstract : EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象的基底類別，所有事件引數類別。The class is an abstract base class for all event argument classes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何撰寫基本的記錄器，建置事件以回應。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. summary.span: 取得或設定位置內容資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets location contextual information.

summary.span: 此屬性附加於記錄事件，用以定義其相對於正在執行之處理序 (Process)、引擎、專案、目標或工作的位置。

span.span: This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.

value.span: 代表位置內容資訊的 物件。

span.span: A object representing the location contextual information.
